summary: Iteration 10: Complete testing of 3 major features - Form Logic Visualization, API Security Page, and Super Admin Dashboard. Backend: 17/17 tests passed (100%). Frontend: All 3 new pages load correctly with full functionality. Fixed a bug in admin_routes.py where isoformat() was called on already-string dates.

issues: Minor ESLint warning: useEffect has missing dependency 'loadData' - does not affect functionality

passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/security/rate-limits - Returns 4 rate limit tiers (free, pro, enterprise, unlimited)
Backend: GET /api/security/rate-limits/{org_id}/status - Returns tier, limit_per_minute, current_usage, reset_at
Backend: POST /api/security/api-keys/{org_id} - Creates API key with name, tier, scopes
Backend: GET /api/security/api-keys/{org_id} - Lists API keys
Backend: DELETE /api/security/api-keys/{org_id}/{key_id} - Revokes API key
Backend: GET /api/security/audit-logs/{org_id} - Returns audit logs with pagination
Backend: GET /api/security/audit-logs/{org_id}/stats - Returns daily stats and error stats
Backend: GET /api/security/settings/{org_id} - Returns security settings
Backend: PUT /api/security/settings/{org_id} - Updates security settings
Backend: GET /api/security/ip-whitelist/{org_id} - Returns IP whitelist
Backend: GET /api/admin/dashboard - Returns stats, billing distribution, recent orgs
Backend: GET /api/admin/organizations - Lists all organizations with usage data
Backend: GET /api/admin/organizations/{org_id} - Returns org details with usage and plan
Backend: GET /api/admin/billing/plans - Returns 3 plans (Free, Pro, Enterprise)
Backend: GET /api/admin/alerts - Returns usage alerts
Backend: GET /api/admin/invoices - Lists invoices
Backend: GET /api/admin/system/stats - Returns daily submissions, users, API calls
Frontend: Login works correctly
Frontend: Dashboard loads with stats and navigation
Frontend: Security page loads at /security with API Security header
Frontend: Security page shows Rate Limit Status (Current tier, Requests/minute)
Frontend: Security page has 3 tabs: API Keys, Audit Logs, Security Settings
Frontend: Create API Key dialog opens with Key Name, Rate Limit Tier, Permissions, Expiration
Frontend: Audit Logs tab shows table with Timestamp, Method, Path, Status, IP columns
Frontend: Security Settings tab shows Two-Factor Authentication, Session Timeout, Max Failed Login Attempts, Password Policy
Frontend: Super Admin Dashboard loads at /admin with Software Galaxy SSO Management subtitle
Frontend: Super Admin shows 4 stats cards: Total Organizations, Total Users, Total Submissions, Monthly Revenue
Frontend: Super Admin has 3 tabs: Organizations, Billing, Analytics
Frontend: Organizations tab shows table with Organization, Tier, Users, Projects, Submissions columns
Frontend: Organizations tab shows Tier Distribution pie chart and Recent Signups list
Frontend: Billing tab shows 3 plans: Free ($0), Pro ($49), Enterprise ($199) with features
Frontend: Billing tab shows Recent Invoices table
Frontend: Analytics tab shows Daily Submissions and New Users charts
Frontend: Form Logic Visualization opens from Form Builder Settings > Logic Visualization
Frontend: Logic Visualization shows flowchart with START, field nodes, END
Frontend: Logic Visualization has Skip Logic and Calculations toggle controls
Frontend: Logic Visualization shows stats badges (Fields, Skip Rules, Calculations)
Frontend: Logic Visualization has legend for node types and edge types
Frontend: Sidebar navigation includes API Security link
Frontend: Sidebar navigation includes Super Admin link
Frontend: All 18 navigation links present in sidebar
critical_code_review_comments: Fixed bug in admin_routes.py lines 114 and 172 - was calling .isoformat() on strings that were already ISO format. Added hasattr check to prevent AttributeError.
seed_data_creation: Created TEST_ prefixed API key during testing (then deleted)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 3 new features fully working: 1) Form Logic Visualization - accessible from Form Builder settings menu, uses React Flow to show form flow as interactive flowchart with START->fields->END, has Skip Logic/Calculations toggles; 2) API Security - /security with tabs for API Keys (CRUD), Audit Logs (filtering, export), Security Settings (2FA, session timeout, password policy); 3) Super Admin - /admin standalone page with Organizations tab (table, tier distribution, recent signups), Billing tab (3 plans with features, invoices), Analytics tab (daily submissions/users charts, API calls). The bug fix in admin_routes.py was due to created_at already being a string in some MongoDB documents.
